<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/3b0ef8cfdbb6cb5a9cb2dc093132b78d7a52c667|patch 8.2.0247: misleading comment in NSIS installer script>
patch 8.2.0247: misleading comment in NSIS installer script

Problem:    Misleading comment in NSIS installer script.
Solution:   Negate the meaning of the comment. (Ken Takata, closes #5627)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0247: misleading comment in NSIS installer script · vim/vim@3b0ef8c
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0247: misleading comment in NSIS installer script · vim/vim@3b0ef8c
attachments.text: Problem: Misleading comment in NSIS installer script. Solution: Negate the meaning of the comment. (Ken Takata, closes #5627)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/2f189750887636fecd440d7ef353d9224e48713f|patch 8.2.0248: MS-Windows: dealing with deprecation is too complicated>
patch 8.2.0248: MS-Windows: dealing with deprecation is too complicated

Problem:    MS-Windows: dealing with deprecation is too complicated.
Solution:   Use io.h directly. Move _CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE to the build
            file. Suppress C4091 warning by setting "_WIN32_WINNT". (Ken
            Takata, closes #5626)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0248: MS-Windows: dealing with deprecation is too complicated · vim/vim@2f18975
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0248: MS-Windows: dealing with deprecation is too complicated · vim/vim@2f18975
attachments.text: Problem: MS-Windows: dealing with deprecation is too complicated. Solution: Use io.h directly. Move _CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE to the build file. Suppress C4091 warning by setting &q...

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/3fb377fa78131004138b22a87afe33eeb7649b94|patch 8.2.0249: MS-Windows: various warnings>
patch 8.2.0249: MS-Windows: various warnings

Problem:    MS-Windows: various warnings.
Solution:   Set the charset to utf-8. Add _WIN32_WINNT and _USING_V110_SDK71_.
            (Ken Takata, closes #5625)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0249: MS-Windows: various warnings · vim/vim@3fb377f
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0249: MS-Windows: various warnings · vim/vim@3fb377f
attachments.text: Problem: MS-Windows: various warnings. Solution: Set the charset to utf-8. Add _WIN32_WINNT and _USING_V110_SDK71_. (Ken Takata, closes #5625)

patch 8.2.0251: a couple of function return types can be more specific

Solution:   Use a better return type. (Ken Takata, closes #5629)
